issue.title: mail.yandex.ru

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://mail.yandex.ru/?uid=137200099#message/189995609279706534](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yandex.ru%2F%3Fuid%3D137200099%23message%2F189995609279706534) ### Comment > Здравствуйте. Вчера у меня произошла неинициализированная загрузка AdGuard. Сегодня обновился интерфейс программы. Реклама сначала блокировалась, я зашла чуть позже в Яндекс Почту и увидела рекламу. ``` Username: zvenigorod-50@list.ru ``` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> ### Issue URL (Ads)
> [https://mail.yandex.ru/?uid=346526917#message/190277084256404301](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yandex.ru%2F%3Fuid%3D346526917%23message%2F190277084256404301)
> 
> ### Comment
> > Захожу в личный ящик яндекс почты, вверху и в правом боку страницы реклама. Если убрать ее кнопкой "блокировать рекламу вручную", после перезагрузки страницы она появляется снова.
> 
> ### Screenshots
> Screenshot 1
> ### System configuration
> Information	Value
> AdGuard product:	AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.124 MV3
> System version:	`Windows 10`
> Browser:	Chrome
> Tracking protection:	disabled
> Filters:	Ad blocking:
> AdGuard Base
> 
> Language-specific:
> AdGuard Russian
> Browsing Security:	disabled
> Browsing Security statistics:	disabled
> Other extensions used:	`Unhook, Rutracker,7TV, Foxit PDF Creator`

Этот репорт создал я, установил адгвард экстра, реклама ушла. Спасибо!

issue.title: www.r10.net
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version Brave w/ Adguard Turkish filter ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Brave ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.r10.net/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Block top and bottom banner ads on r10.net (728x91 image ads inside container divs) ``` www.r10.net##div.container > div:has(a[target="_blank"] > img[width="728"][height="91"]) ``` 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1 & 2 (Before):
Screenshot 3 & 4 (After):
